core:process.core:name: File Importer Import Job
core:process.core:comment: Because File objects can't be serialized in a scheduled job, this process simply instantiates the required File object(s) before calling the main file importer process.

core:action.core:name: POSTerminal
core:action.core:comment: Creates an entity key from the namespace and local name.

core:action.core:name: POSTerminal
core:action.core:comment: Loads the entity for the entity key.
